data.text: Yaa qajeeltota, isin Waaqayyotti gammadaa;
Kiraaraan Waaqayyoon galateeffadhaa;
Faarfannaa haaraa isaaf faarfadhaa; ribuu haalaan rukutaa;
Dubbiin Waaqayyoo qajeelaadhaatii;
Waaqayyo qajeelummaa fi murtii qajeelaa jaallata;
Samiiwwan dubbii Waaqayyootiin hojjetaman;
Inni bishaan galaanaa akka tuullaatti walitti qaba;
Lafti hundi Waaqayyoon haa sodaatu;
Inni dubbateeraatii, wanni inni dubbate ni taʼe;
Waaqayyo marii sabootaa ni fashaleessa;
Karoorri Waaqayyoo garuu bara baraan, yaadni garaa isaas
Sabni Waaqayyo Waaqa isaaf taʼe,
Waaqayyo samii irraa gad ni ilaala;
inni teessoo isaa irra taaʼee,
inni garaa nama hundumaa uumu sun,
Mootiin baayʼina loltoota isaatiin duʼa hin oolu;
Fardi moʼannaadhaaf abdii gatii hin qabnee dha;
Garuu iji Waaqayyoo warra isa sodaatan irra,
inni lubbuu isaanii duʼa jalaa ni baasa;
Lubbuun keenya abdiidhaan Waaqayyoon eeggatti;
Garaan keenya isatti ni gammadaatii;
Yaa Waaqayyo, akkuma nu abdii keenya
